title: Hisame Furaba Koi Chigiri
alternative_title: 氷雨降らば恋契り ; Ngày Mưa Lạnh Đôi Mình Hẹn Ước ; Nếu Trời Đổ Mưa Lạnh Thì Se Duyên Cho Đôi Ta ; 비가 내리면 사랑의 맹세를
status: 氷雨降らば恋契り ; Ngày Mưa Lạnh Đôi Mình Hẹn Ước ; Nếu Trời Đổ Mưa Lạnh Thì Se Duyên Cho Đôi Ta ; 비가 내리면 사랑의 맹세를
description:
Description :
        "I'll have you join me in matrimony..."Toono Itsuki is a university student who majors in folkore studies. He's currently headed towards his grandparents' hometown as part of his thesis' fieldwork. There, a local warned him to "not get close to the mountain on days when the rain is cold". Despite the warning, Itsuki still went towards it and there he met!?Here's a BL about a local god and a folklore geek!
